prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Reed, Bass, Piano, but without Guitar.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Piano, Bass, Reed, and Drums, but no Guitar.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Drums, Reed, Bass, and Piano, but no Guitar.

Style 3:
Guitar is absent from this song, which instead includes Piano, Bass, Reed, and Drums.
